languages.text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, с некоторым шансом он может увеличить бонус критического урона в полтора раза. Этот шанс составляет <u>(шанс критического попадания персонажа − 50)</u>% и не может опуститься ниже 0.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character performs a critical hit, they have a chance to add their critical bonus damage to a critical hit for the second time, and this chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (to a minimum of 0%).

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to add their critical damage bonus to the critical hit for the second time. This chance of the second critical is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (to a minimum of 0%) and it adds half the usual critical damage.

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to add their critical damage bonus to the critical hit for the second time. This chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (to a minimum of 0%). If successful, only half the usual critical damage is added.

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to add their critical damage bonus to the critical hit for the second time. This chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (to a minimum of 0%). If successful, only half the usual critical damage is added.

Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to add their critical damage bonus to the critical hit for a second time. This chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%). If successful, only half the usual critical damage is added.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, tiene una probabilidad de aumentar su bonificación de daño por impacto crítico un 50 %. Esta probabilidad es igual a <u>(probabilidad de impacto crítico del personaje − 50)</u> % (hasta un mínimo de 0 %).
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, tiene una probabilidad de aumentar su bonificación de daño por impacto crítico un 50 %. Esta probabilidad es igual a <u>(probabilidad de impacto crítico del personaje − 50)</u> % (hasta un mínimo de 0 %).

languages.text: このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、一定確率でそのクリティカルダメージが50%増加する。この確率は<u>(キャラクターのクリティカルヒット率 − 50)</u>%（最低0%）に等しい。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、一定確率でそのクリティカルダメージが50%増加する。この確率は<u>(キャラクターのクリティカルヒット率 − 50)</u>%（最低0%）に等しい。
このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、一定確率でそのクリティカルヒットに2度目のダメージボーナスを与える。この確率は<u>(キャラクターのクリティカルヒット率 — 50)</u>%（最低0%）となる。2度目のダメージが発動すると、通常のクリティカルダメージの半分が与えられる。

languages.text: 每当角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都有一定几率使暴击伤害加成提高一半。此效果触发几率为<u>（角色的暴击率-50）</u>%，最低为0%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: 每当角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都有一定几率使暴击伤害加成提高一半。此效果触发几率为<u>（角色的暴击率-50）</u>%，最低为0%。
每当角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都有一定几率使得下次暴击造成更高伤害。此效果触发几率为<u>（角色的暴击率-50）</u>%，最低为0%。若成功触发此效果，下次暴击额外造成正常暴击伤害的一半。

languages.text: Erzielt der Charakter einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}, hat er eine Chance, seinen kritischen Schadensbonus um die Hälfte zu erhöhen. Diese Chance entspricht <u>(Kritische Trefferchance des Charakters — 50)</u>% (mindestens 0 %).
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: Erzielt der Charakter einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}, hat er eine Chance, seinen kritischen Schadensbonus um die Hälfte zu erhöhen. Diese Chance entspricht <u>(Kritische Trefferchance des Charakters — 50)</u>% (mindestens 0 %).

Immer wenn der Charakter einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, hat er die Chance, seinen kritischen Schadensbonus dem kritischen Treffer ein zweites Mal hinzuzufügen. Diese Chance entspricht <u>(kritische Trefferchance des Charakters − 50)</u> % (mindestens 0 %). Bei Erfolg wird nur die Hälfte des üblichen kritischen Schadens addiert.

Immer wenn der Charakter einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, hat er die Chance, seinen kritischen Schadensbonus dem kritischen Treffer ein zweites Mal hinzuzufügen. Diese Chance entspricht <u>(kritische Trefferchance des Charakters − 50)</u> % (mindestens 0 %). Bei Erfolg wird nur die Hälfte des üblichen kritischen Schadens addiert.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, il a une chance d'augmenter de moitié son bonus de dégâts critiques. Cette chance est égale à <u>(chances de coup critique du personnage − 50)</u> % (0 % minimum).
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, il a une chance d'augmenter de moitié son bonus de dégâts critiques. Cette chance est égale à <u>(chances de coup critique du personnage − 50)</u> % (0 % minimum).

Chaque fois que le personnage inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, il a une chance d'ajouter une deuxième fois son bonus de dégâts critiques au coup porté. Cette chance est égale à <u>(chances de coup critique du personnage − 50)</u> % (0 % minimum). En cas de réussite, seule la moitié des dégâts critiques habituels est ajoutée.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, с некоторым шансом он может увеличить бонус критического урона в полтора раза. Этот шанс составляет <u>(шанс критического попадания персонажа − 50)</u>% и не может опуститься ниже 0.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they have a chance to increase their critical damage bonus by half. That chance is equal to <u>(character's critical hit chance − 50)</u>% (minimum of 0%).

traits.locale_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, с определенным шансом персонаж может дважды добавить {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} критического урона к критическому попаданию. Этот шанс составляет <u>(шанс критического попадания персонажа − 50)</u>% и не может опуститься ниже 0.

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, с определенным шансом персонаж может дважды добавить {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} критического урона к критическому попаданию. Этот шанс составляет <u>(шанс критического попадания персонажа − 50)</u>% и не может опуститься ниже 0.

languages.text: Karakter, her {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yaptığında verdiği kritik hasarı yarı yarıya artırma olasılığı bulunur. Bu olasılık, %<u>(karakterin kritik vuruş olasılığı − 50)</u> (minimum %0) değerine eşittir.
